info.description:
The Many Adventures of
Button & Braille
based loosely off "Button & Braille and the Monocle of Nord" 
---


Button & Braille have just returned after saving Silver City from the clockwork army of critters constructed by the evil genius, Nord. Having left Nord to his own devices, the city has granted Button & Braille the titles of Honorary Adventurers and Watchers in Training. Receiving medals for their bravery and resilience, the two have now settled into the peaceful life of upstanding citizens.

But "peaceful" is not a word that's in Button's vocabulary! The young adventurer is always looking for new and exciting mysteries to solve. And she won't be going anywhere without her trusty cohort, Braille.

---


Characters -

Button - a talkative, boisterous and confident young girl, "Button" Mayberry is 15 years old and full of life. Never found without her handy slingshot and bags of button ammunition, she is more than willing to take on any opponent that crosses her path. Trouble seems to follow this young blonde adventurer, but luckily, so does her good friend, Braille.

Braille - quiet and reserved, there's much mystery surrounding this 16 year old and his past. Button discovered the boy's strange connection to the evil genius Nord, being Braille's long lost father, but has kept his secret to herself. Braille has taken to following Button around and is never without his odd baton, in case they should come upon any unexpected foes. He showed his skills at fighting in the tunnels beneath Silver City, but that too has been kept a secret between the duo.

---


Feel free to add! Keep in mind the rating of 13+. This is meant to be fun and young adult. GPs may be awarded for quality chapters.
